r.s: Providing a somewhat unified API for handling
r.d: XML_Feed_Parser is a parser for (the various) RSS and Atom format XML feeds. It attempts to provide a somewhat unified API while still allowing access to the full details of each feed type.
r.n: Added support for RSS0.90, RSS0.91 and RSS0.92 Added tests for RSS0.91 and RSS0.92 Fixed bug meaning that errors weren't being thrown for unrecognised RSS versions Cleared up the main constructor to prevent DOM errors while detecting feed type Added code to allow case-insensitive specification of element names as a backup Fixed bad check of guid's 'ispermalink' attribute in RSS2Element.php
